title: Sulfur vacancy induced radical generation in ZnIn2S4 for lignin photocatalytic Cα-Cβ cleavage
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00741G, Paper
Jifang Zhang, Jinde Sun, Chengcheng Suo, Wei Li, Sha Luo, Bing Tian, Chunhui Ma, Shouxin Liu
The low efficiency of photogenerated charge transfer to generate reactive oxygen species is the main factor that limits the photocatalytic activity of ZnIn2S4 (ZIS)-based materials in lignin depolymerization. In this...
